summary: "Planet of the Apes" (2001) is an American sci-fi adventure film directed by Tim Burton. It's the sixth film in the series, based on Pierre Boulle's 1963 novel. Astronaut Leo Davidson (Mark Wahlberg) crashes on a planet where intelligent apes rule and humans are slaves. With help from a kind ape named Ari (Helena Bonham Carter), Leo starts a rebellion to return home. The film had a long development process with many changes in directors and scripts. It received mixed reviews, with critics praising the visuals but criticizing the plot. Although it made money, no sequel was made.
title: Planet of the Apes (2001 film)
